Tablet
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 23 - Take this medicine when your stomach is empty. This means an hour before food or 2 hours after food

Label 25 - Swallow this medicine whole. Do not chew or crush

Atripla 600mg/200mg/245mg tablets <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Gilead Sciences International Ltd)</ph> 12948911000001102

Efavirenz 600 mg

Emtricitabine 200 mg

Tenofovir disoproxil (as Tenofovir disoproxil fumarate) 245 mg

  • 30 tablet POM

    NHS indicative price = £532.87

EFAVIRENZ WITH EMTRICITABINE AND TENOFOVIR
